hero.title: Services That Scale
hero.subtitle: End-to-End Digital Solutions
hero.description: From concept to deployment, we provide comprehensive technology services that power modern businesses.

services.title: Web Development
services.shortDescription: Modern, performant web applications built with cutting-edge frameworks.
services.fullDescription: We build blazing-fast, scalable web applications using the latest technologies. Our expertise spans from simple marketing sites to complex enterprise platforms, all optimized for performance, SEO, and user experience.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.shortDescription: Native and cross-platform mobile apps that users love.
services.fullDescription: Whether you need a native iOS/Android app or a cross-platform solution, we deliver exceptional mobile experiences that engage users and drive business results.

services.title: Cloud & DevOps
services.shortDescription: Scalable cloud infrastructure and automated deployment pipelines.
services.fullDescription: We architect and implement cloud solutions that grow with your business. From migration to optimization, our cloud expertise ensures reliability, security, and cost-efficiency.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.shortDescription: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces backed by user research.
services.fullDescription: Great design is invisible. We create user experiences that feel natural, look stunning, and drive conversions through data-driven design decisions.

services.title: AI & Machine Learning
services.shortDescription: Intelligent solutions powered by artificial intelligence.
services.fullDescription: Harness the power of AI to automate processes, gain insights, and create innovative features that set you apart from competitors.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.shortDescription: Strategic technology guidance for complex challenges.
services.fullDescription: Sometimes you need expert advice before diving into development. Our consultants provide strategic guidance on architecture, technology selection, and digital transformation.
